description.english: A peaceful confrontation is always the best solution.
description.french: C’est toujours mieux de se parler face à face, sans animosité.
description.german: Eine friedliche Auseinandersetzung ist immer die beste Lösung.
description.italian: Confrontarsi pacificamente è sempre la soluzione migliore.
description.schinese: 心平气和地对谈，往往是最好的解决办法。
description.spanish: Una confrontación pacífica siempre es la mejor solución.

description.english: The most important feature in the whole game.
description.french: La meilleure fonctionnalité du jeu.
description.german: Das wichtigste Feature im ganzen Spiel.
description.italian: La feature più importante di tutto il gioco.
description.schinese: 这是整个游戏最重要的特色。
description.spanish: La función más importante del juego.

description.english: Thimbleweed Coin, right?
description.french: On est à Thimbleweed Coin ou quoi ?
description.german: Thimbleweed-Münze, richtig?
description.italian: Thimbleweed Coin, giusto?
description.schinese: 像不像《银莲花公园》的钱币？
description.spanish: Una moneda de Thimbleweed, ¿no?

description.english: Sometimes a second chance is not enough.
description.french: Parfois, avoir une seconde chance ne suffit pas.
description.german: Manchmal ist eine zweite Chance nicht genug.
description.italian: Talvolta non basta una seconda possibilità.
description.schinese: 有时候再来一次也不够。
description.spanish: A veces no basta con una segunda oportunidad.

description.english: Okay, no tutorial next time.
description.french: D’accord, d’accord. Pas de tuto la prochaine fois.
description.german: Okay, nächstes Mal kein Tutorial.
description.italian: Ok, la prossima volta nessun tutorial.
description.schinese: 好，下一次没有教程。
description.spanish: Vale, la próxima vez no habrá tutorial.

description.english: Change is not always the best choice.
description.french: Le changement n’est pas toujours une bonne chose.
description.german: Veränderung ist nicht immer die beste Wahl.
description.italian: Non sempre cambiare è la scelta migliore.
description.schinese: 变化有些时候并不是最好的选择。
description.spanish: El cambio no es siempre la mejor opción.

description.english: This cameo counts as a sequel, ok?
description.french: Ce caméo, c’est un peu comme une suite, non ?
description.german: Dieser Cameo-Auftritt zählt als Fortsetzung, oder?
description.italian: Questa comparsata vale come un sequel, ok?
description.schinese: 这个客串可以算续作吧？
description.spanish: Este cameo cuenta como continuación, ¿no?

description.english: Did you really unlock all the endings?
description.french: Vraiment, vous avez débloqué toutes les fins ?
description.german: Hast du wirklich alle Enden freigeschaltet?
description.italian: Hai davvero sbloccato tutti i finali?
description.schinese: 所有结局真的都解锁了吗？
description.spanish: ¿De verdad has desbloqueado todos los finales?

description.english: You can't wear them, but no one is stopping you from collecting them.
description.french: Vous ne pouvez pas porter ces cosmétiques, mais rien ne vous empêche de les collectionner.
description.german: Du kannst sie nicht tragen, aber niemand hindert dich daran, sie zu sammeln.
description.italian: Non puoi indossarli, ma nessuno ti vieta di collezionarli.
description.schinese: 虽然不能穿，但谁也不没有拦着你收集。
description.spanish: No puedes ponerte nada, pero nada te impide coleccionarlo.

description.english: Your (virtual) criminal record will suffer.
description.french: Votre casier judiciaire (virtuel) va prendre un coup.
description.german: Dein (virtuelles) Vorstrafenregister wird darunter leiden.
description.italian: La tua fedina penale (virtuale) ne risentirà.
description.schinese: 你的（虚拟）犯罪记录要麻烦了。
description.spanish: Tu ficha policial (virtual) se va a resentir.

description.english: Let the journey begin.
description.french: Que l’aventure commence.
description.german: Lass die Reise beginnen.
description.italian: Che il viaggio abbia inizio.
description.schinese: 旅程开始。
description.spanish: Que empiece el viaje.

description.english: Press “accept”: it's just a formality.
description.french: Allez-y, acceptez-les. C’est juste une petite formalité.
description.german: Drücke „Akzeptieren“: Es ist nur eine Formalität.
description.italian: Premi
description.schinese: 按“接受”，只是走个形式。
description.spanish: Pulsa

description.english: Feel free to contact a mod to contest your ban.
description.french: N’hésitez pas à contacter un modérateur pour contester cette décision.
description.german: Kontaktiere gerne einen Moderator, um deinen Bann anzufechten.
description.italian: Contatta pure un mod per contestare il tuo ban.
description.schinese: 尽管联系管理员，针对你的封禁进行申诉。
description.spanish: Ponte en contacto con un mod para impugnar tu baneo.

description.english: I didn't think you had this competitive spirit in you...
description.french: Je ne pensais pas que vous aimiez tant la compétition…
description.german: Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass du diesen Wettbewerbsgeist in dir hast ...
description.italian: Non pensavo avessi questo spirito competitivo...
description.schinese: 完全没想到你这么有竞技精神……
description.spanish: Quién habría pensado que tenías un carácter tan competitivo...

description.english: dRea, Froez and Yum1 are proud of you.
description.french: dRea, Froez et Yum1 sont fiers de vous.
description.german: dRea, Froez und Yum1 sind stolz auf dich.
description.italian: dRea, Froez e Yum1 sono fieri di te.
description.schinese: 你让迪莉亚、弗洛伊兹和尤米很欣慰。
description.spanish: dRea, Froez y Yum1 están orgullosos de ti.

description.english: Your studies in color theory have finally paid off.
description.french: Enfin, vos connaissances en théorie des couleurs portent leurs fruits.
description.german: Dein Studium der Farbtheorie hat sich endlich ausgezahlt.
description.italian: I tuoi studi sulla teoria del colore sono serviti a qualcosa.
description.schinese: 你在颜色领域的研究终于有了回报。
description.spanish: Tus estudios de teoría del color por fin han servido para algo.

description.english: It's important to stay hydrated.
description.french: C’est important de s’hydrater.
description.german: Es ist wichtig, hydriert zu bleiben.
description.italian: È importante rimanere idratati.
description.schinese: 保证水分很重要！
description.spanish: Hidratarse es importante.

description.english: Without a doubt the weirdest date you've ever been on.
description.french: Certainement le rendez-vous le plus étrange de votre vie.
description.german: Ohne Zweifel das seltsamste Date, das du je hattest.
description.italian: Senza dubbio l'appuntamento più strano della tua vita.
description.schinese: 无疑是你参加过的最奇怪的约会。
description.spanish: Sin duda alguna ha sido la cita más rara que has tenido.

description.english: Not like those fluff gurus!
description.french: Pas comme ces gurus de pacotille !
description.german: Nicht wie diese Fluff-Gurus!
description.italian: Altro che quei guru tutta fuffa!
description.schinese: 不学那些蠢人！
description.spanish: ¡No como esos gurús falsarios!

description.english: Growing up is painful.
description.french: C’est dur de grandir.
description.german: Erwachsenwerden ist schmerzhaft.
description.italian: Crescere è doloroso.
description.schinese: 长大是痛苦的。
description.spanish: Crecer duele.

description.english: The ultimate solution against keyboard warriors.
description.french: La meilleure arme contre les guerriers du clavier.
description.german: Die ultimative Lösung gegen Tastaturkrieger.
description.italian: La soluzione definitiva contro i leoni da tastiera.
description.schinese: 这是对抗键盘侠的终极解决办法。
description.spanish: La solución definitiva contra los guerreros del teclado.

description.english: Not everyone likes certain heights.
description.french: On est pas tous à l’aise en hauteur.
description.german: Nicht jeder mag bestimmte Höhen.
description.italian: Non tutti gradiscono certe altezze.
description.schinese: 不是所有人都喜欢高处。
description.spanish: No a todo el mundo le gustan las alturas.

description.english: Don't hold back the tears.
description.french: Ne retenez pas vos larmes.
description.german: Halte die Tränen nicht zurück.
description.italian: Non trattenere le lacrime.
description.schinese: 想哭就哭。
description.spanish: No aguantes las lágrimas.

description.english: We are what we eat.
description.french: On est ce que l’on mange.
description.german: Wir sind, was wir essen.
description.italian: Siamo ciò che mangiamo.
description.schinese: 吃什么，就是什么。
description.spanish: Somos lo que comemos.

description.english: I remembered these works a little differently.
description.french: C’est bizarre, je me souvenais pas que ces tableaux ressemblaient à ça…
description.german: Diese Werke waren mir leicht anders in Erinnerung.
description.italian: Queste opere le ricordavo un po' diverse.
description.schinese: 我印象里这些作品不太一样。
description.spanish: Recuerdo estas obras un poco distintas.

description.english: Two sides of the same coin.
description.french: Deux faces d’une même pièce.
description.german: Zwei Seiten derselben Medaille.
description.italian: Due facce della stessa medeglia.
description.schinese: 硬币有正反两面。
description.spanish: Dos caras de la misma moneda.

description.english: What's the matter with you, Dad?
description.french: Qu’est-ce qui ne va pas, Papa ?
description.german: Was ist los mit dir, Dad?
description.italian: Che ti succede, papà?
description.schinese: 爸，你怎么了？
description.spanish: ¿Qué pasa contigo, papá?

description.english: The fate of The Arcade is in your hands.
description.french: Le destin de L’Arcade est entre vos mains.
description.german: Das Schicksal von The Arcade liegt in deinen Händen.
description.italian: Il destino di The Arcade è nelle tue mani.
description.schinese: 游戏机城的命运掌握在你手里。
description.spanish: El destino de The Arcade está en tus manos.

description.english: No matter what, you will always remain a jade bunny.
description.french: Quoi qu’il advienne, vous serez à jamais un lapin de jade.
description.german: Egal was passiert, du wirst immer ein Jadehase bleiben.
description.italian: Comunque vada, rimarrai sempre una coniglietta di giada.
description.schinese: 不论怎么样，你都永远是小玉兔。
description.spanish: Pase lo que pase, siempre serás un conejito de jade.

description.english: Have a taste of my sword!
description.french: Elle a bon goût mon épée ?
description.german: Probier mein Schwert!
description.italian: Assaggiate il sapore della mia spada!
description.schinese: 尝尝我长剑的滋味！
description.spanish: ¡Prueba mi espada!

description.english: Is a king without his crown still a king?
description.french: Un roi sans couronne… Est-il toujours vraiment un roi ?
description.german: Ist ein König ohne Krone immer noch ein König?
description.italian: Un re senza la sua corona è ancora un re?
description.schinese: 国王没了王冠，还是国王吗？
description.spanish: ¿Es un rey sin corona aún rey?

description.english: You know how to silence a cheater.
description.french: Vous savez comment vous y prendre avec les tricheurs.
description.german: Du weißt, wie man einen Betrüger zum Schweigen bringt.
description.italian: Sai come mettere a tacere un cheater.
description.schinese: 你知道怎么打败作弊用户。
description.spanish: Sabes cómo hacer que un tramposo se calle.

description.english: So sleepy, these mods!
description.french: Ils sont à la traîne ces modos !
description.german: So schläfrig, diese Moderatoren!
description.italian: Che sonno, questi mod!
description.schinese: 这些管理员，昏昏欲睡！
description.spanish: ¡Vaya mods más despistados!
